column3: Group code
column5: Whether or not detailed requirements are provided

column3: Contents of property
This property indicates the ON/OFF status.
Used to specify the operation mode (“automatic,” “cooling,” “heating,” “dehumidification,” “air circulator” or “other”), and to acquire the current setting.
column4: The following values shall be used: Automatic: 0x41 Cooling: 0x42 Heating: 0x43 Dehumidification: 0x44 Air circulator: 0x45 Other: 0x40

column3: Used to specify whether or not to use the automatic temperature control function, and to acquire the current setting.
Used to specify the type of operation (“normal,” “high-speed” or “silent”), and to acquire the current setting.
column4: Normal operation: 0x41 High-speed operation: 0x42 Silent operation: 0x43

column3: Used to set the temperature and to acquire the current setting.

column2: Set value of relative humidity in dehumidifying mode
column3: Used to set the relative humidity for the “dehumidification” mode and to acquire the current setting.

column2: Set temperature value in cooling mode
column3: Used to set the temperature for the “cooling” mode and to acquire the current setting.

column2: Set temperature value in heating mode
column3: Used to set the temperature for the “heating” mode and to acquire the current setting.

column2: Set temperature value in dehumidifying mode
column3: Used to set the temperature for the “dehumidification” mode and to acquire the current setting.
Rated power consumption in each operation mode of cooling/heating/dehumidifying/blast
Measured value of current consumption

column2: Measured value of room relative humidity
column3: Measured value of room relative humidity
Measured value of room temperature

column2: Set temperature value of user remote control
column3: Set temperature value of user remote control
This property indicates the measured cooled air temperature at the outlet.
This property indicates the measured outdoor air temperature.
Used to set the relative temperature relative to the target temperature for an air conditioner operation mode, and to acquire the current setting.

Used to specify the air flow rate or use the function to automatically control the air flow rate, and to acquire the current setting. The air flow rate shall be selected from among the 8 predefined levels.
column4: Automatic air flow rate control function used = 0x41 Air flow rate = 0x31.0x38

column2: Automatic control of air flow direction setting
column3: Used to specify whether or not to use the automatic air flow direction control function, to specify the plane(s) (vertical and/or horizontal) in which the automatic air flow direction control function is to be used, and to acquire the current setting.

column2: Automatic swing of air flow setting
column3: Used to specify whether or not to use the automatic air flow swing function, to specify the plane(s) (vertical and/or horizontal) in which the automatic air flow swing function is to be used, and to acquire the current setting.
column4: Automatic air flow swing function not used = 0x31, used (vertical) = 0x41, used (horizontal) = 0x42, used (vertical and horizontal) = 0x43

column3: Used to specify the air flow direction in the vertical plane by selecting a pattern from among the 5 predefined patterns, and to acquire the current setting.
column4: Uppermost = 0x41, lowermost = 0x42, central = 0x43, midpoint between uppermost and central = 0x44, midpoint between lowermost and central = 0x45

column3: Used to specify the air flow direction(s) in the horizontal plane by selecting a pattern from among the 31 predefined patterns, and to acquire the current setting.
column4: Rightward = 0x41, leftward = 0x42, central = 0x43, rightward and leftward = 0x44 (for a full list of the predefined patterns, see the table in the subsection defining the detailed requirements for this property.

column3: This property indicates if the air conditioner is in a “special” state (i.e. the “defrosting,” “preheating,” or “heat removal” state).
column4: “Normal operation” state = 0x40, “Defrosting” state = 0x41, “Preheating” state = 0x42, “Heat removal” state = 0x43

column3: Used to indicate when the air conditioner is in a “non-priority” state.
Used to specify whether or not to use the ventilation function, to specify the ventilation direction, and to acquire the current setting.
column4: Ventilation function ON (outlet direction) = 0x41, ventilation function OFF = 0x42, ventilation function ON (intake direction) = 0x43

column3: Used to specify whether or not to use the humidifier function, and to acquire the current setting.
column4: Humidifier function ON = 0x41, Humidifier function OFF = 0x42

column3: Used to specify the ventilation air flow rate by selecting a level from among the predefined levels, and to acquire the current setting.
column4: Automatic control of ventilation air flow rate = 0x41, ventilation air flow rate = 0x31.0x38

column3: Used to specify the degree of humidification to achieve by selecting a level from among the predefined levels, and to acquire the current setting.
column4: Automatic control of the degree of humidification = 0x41 Degree of humidification = 0x31.0x38

column3: A bitmap indicates mounted method of exercising air cleaning function.
column4: Bit 0: Information about electrical dust collection method mounting 0 - Not mounted 1 - Mounted Bit 1: Information about cluster ion method mounting 0 - Not mounted 1 - Mounted

column3: An 8-byte array used to specify, for each type of air purifier function, whether or not to use the air purifier function and the degree of air purification to achieve with the air purifier function, and to acquire the current settings.
column4: Element 0: Indicates whether or not to use the electrical dust collection-based air purifier function. Element 1: Indicates whether or not to use the cluster ion-based air purifier function. Elements 2 to 7: Reserved for future use.

column3: A bitmap indicates mounted method for exercising refresh function.
column4: Bit 0: Information about minus ion method mounting 0 - Not mounted 1 - Mounted Bit 1: Information about cluster ion method mounting 0 - Not mounted 1 - Mounted

column3: An 8-byte array used to specify, for each type of air refresher function, whether or not to use the air refresher function and the degree of air refreshing to achieve with the air refresher function, and to acquire the current settings.
column4: Element 0: Indicates whether or not to use the minus ion-based air refresher function. Element 1: Indicates whether or not to use the cluster ion-based air refresher function. Elements 2.7: Reserved for future use.

column3: A bitmap indicates mounted method for exercising self-cleaning function.
column4: Bit 0: Information about ozone cleaning method mounting 0 - Not mounted 1 - Mounted Bit 1: Information about drying method mounting 0 - Not mounted 1 - Mounted

column3: An 8-byte array used to specify, for each type of self-cleaning function, whether or not to use the self-cleaning function and the degree of self-cleaning to achieve with the self-cleaning function, and to acquire the current settings.
column4: Element 0: Indicates whether or not to use the ozone-based self-cleaning function. Element 1: Indicates whether or not to use the drying-based self-cleaning function. Elements 2.7: Reserved for future use.

column3: Used to specify the “special function” to use, and to acquire the current setting.
column4: No setting: 0x40, clothes dryer function: 0x41, condensation suppressor function: 0x42, mite and mold control function: 0x43, active defrosting function: 0x44 0x45. : Reserved for future use.

column3: This property indicates the operation status of components of the air conditioner in a bitmap format.
column4: Bit 0: Operation status of the compressor: 0: Not operating 1: In operation Bit 1: Operation status of the thermostat: 0: Thermostat OFF 1: Thermostat ON Bits 2.7: Reserved for future use.

column3: Used to specify whether or not to allow the air conditioner to operate ignoring its thermostat setting.
column4: Normal setting = 0x40, thermostat setting override function ON = 0x41, thermostat setting override function OFF = 0x42

column3: Used to set the air purification mode setting ON/OFF and to acquire the current setting.
Used to specify whether or not to use the ON timer (time-based reservation function, relative time-based reservation function or both), and to acquire the current setting.
column4: Both the time- and relative time-based reservation functions are ON = 0x41, both reservation functions are OFF = 0x42, time-based reservation function is ON = 0x43, relative time-based reservation function is ON = 0x44

column3: Used to specify the time for the time-based reservation function in the HH:MM format and to acquire the current setting.
Used to specify the relative time for the relative time-based reservation function in the HH:MM format and to acquire the current setting.
Used to specify whether or not to use the OFF timer (time-based reservation function, relative time-based reservation function or both), and to acquire the current setting.
column4: Both the time- and relative time-based reservation functions are ON = 0x41, both reservation functions are OFF = 0x42, time-based reservation function is ON = 0x43, relative time-based reservation function is ON = 0x44

column3: Used to specify the time for the time-based reservation function in the HH:MM format and to acquire the current setting.
Used to specify the relative time for the relative time-based reservation function in the HH:MM format and to acquire the current setting.
